title: [英文文宣拋磚] 召喚鍵盤戰士同外國人解釋今日香港請願

replies.msg:
好多外國人唔明今日請願嘅目的，各位鍵盤戰士一定要好好解釋清楚

我拋磚引玉整個FAQ, 熟悉美國政治同埋英文好嘅手足請接力

1. 點解唔搵英國？Why don’t find the UK instead?

We are here to urge the US Congress to pass the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act.

We would appreciate the UK, EU, or other countries to pass a similar act to pressure the HK and China officials that corrodes the HK freedom and democracy.

2. 點解美國要幫你？美國可以點幫你？Why should the US help and how could the US help?

The US shares a lot of common interests with Hong Kong.
- HK is an international financial hub that freely connects to the world economy. China uses Hong Kong to attract foreign investments and steal technology. These are what the US want to stop.

- Tens of thousands Americans, Europeans, Canadians and Australians work, study, and travel in HK. There are also tons of foreign companies setting up offices in HK. The US interests in HK is high.

- HK is in the frontline of the free world. We share the similar ideas of freedoms and human rights and we enjoy rule of law and high degree of autonomy. Please stand with Hong Kong.


3. 咩嘢係香港人權法案？What is the HK human rights and democracy act?

The Act requires the US Secretary of State to submit a review of HK autonomy and human right status to the Congress every year. If the HK autonomy and human rights situation is questioned, the US could seize the treat HK as a separate custom territory. That would probably be disastrous to HK economy, but China would be harmed too if it loses its free financial port.


4. 我支持你地，但Trump唔會幫你地，慳返啖氣啦。Trump would not help you.

The act is indeed proposed in the US congress and received considerable bipartisan approval. According to Nancy Pelosi: https://www.speaker.gov/newsroom/9419?utm_source=share&utm_medium=ios_app

Every support matters to us. Please stand with HK and defend freedom of the people.
